record.id: field.name="skip" and file.name="import" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: skip
record.file.name: import

brief.brief: Determines what action to take when a query does not select one, and only one, record during import.
This field can contain true, false, or a qualifying expression. It is only operational if you define a query in the import record.

If the condition is true and your query returns either no records or more than one record, the import process sends a message and then reads the next record from the external file. It does not add or update any records in the Service Manager database.
If the condition is false or NULL, Service Manager uses the add/replace option to determine how to proceed.
